home.desc: Never underestimate the power of knowledge. The more we learn, the more we raise. We are here with you to teach/discuss about the technology in native language with simple explanations and with practical examples.
home.content: Thank you for taking the time to look out this, so I can get to know you better and have an idea of how I can best support you in learning modern technologies
